Articles.Content:
![Eryl2xU.png](http://i.imgur.com/Eryl2xU.png)
**A-6 Intruder**

![jLVlr2F.png](http://i.imgur.com/jLVlr2F.png)

I don't think anyone has made an A-6 ever in KSP, so this request is sort of special. The craft is maneuverable and stable. It is easily flown and glides very easily. Its really quickly too ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Action groups are:

1 - Toggle Jet engines

0 - Toggle Intakes

[**DOWNLOAD**](http://www./download/cxvk1uug43hhkjr/A-6+Intruder.craft)

![PqvXKhK.png](http://i.imgur.com/PqvXKhK.png)

![cIv35MD.png](http://i.imgur.com/cIv35MD.png)
hmm looks good and it is probably the only a6 i found

> 
> hmm looks good and it is probably the only a6 i found

Correct answer is: It is the only one you found ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I seriously have never seen anyone build this one, so I might as well build because I know a little about it.

Gotta love the Intruder. I'm rather partial to replicas of real craft, myself, and this looks like a quite well-done one ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

>

> I seriously have never seen anyone build this one, so I might as well build because I know a little about it.

Don't force that one on me. I have too much WW2 planes knowledge! Argh! WW1 TOO!
